create_time.description: Time when the policy-based route was created.

description.description: An optional description of this resource.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

labels.description: User-defined labels. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

name.description: The name of the policy based route.

network.description: Fully-qualified URL of the network that this route applies to, for example: projects/my-project/global/networks/my-network.

next_hop_ilb_ip.description: The IP address of a global-access-enabled L4 ILB that is the next hop for matching packets.

next_hop_other_routes.description: Other routes that will be referenced to determine the next hop of the packet. Possible values: ["DEFAULT_ROUTING"]

priority.description: The priority of this policy-based route. Priority is used to break ties in cases where there are more than one matching policy-based routes found. In cases where multiple policy-based routes are matched, the one with the lowest-numbered priority value wins. The default value is 1000. The priority value must be from 1 to 65535, inclusive.

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

update_time.description: Time when the policy-based route was created.

warnings.description: If potential misconfigurations are detected for this route, this field will be populated with warning messages.

dest_range.description: The destination IP range of outgoing packets that this policy-based route applies to. Default is "0.0.0.0/0".

ip_protocol.description: The IP protocol that this policy-based route applies to. Valid values are 'TCP', 'UDP', and 'ALL'. Default is 'ALL'.

protocol_version.description: Internet protocol versions this policy-based route applies to. Possible values: ["IPV4", "IPV6"]

src_range.description: The source IP range of outgoing packets that this policy-based route applies to. Default is "0.0.0.0/0".

block.description: The filter to match L4 traffic.

region.description: Cloud region to install this policy-based route on for Interconnect attachments. Use 'all' to install it on all Interconnect attachments.

block.description: The interconnect attachments that this policy-based route applies to.

tags.description: A list of VM instance tags that this policy-based route applies to. VM instances that have ANY of tags specified here will install this PBR.

block.description: VM instances to which this policy-based route applies to.
